On this page

Starter Websites ​

Ideal for one-person businesses, micro-businesses, home-based businesses, or professionals, helps you establish authority and credibility.

You immediately enhance your online presence, making it easier for potential clients to find and trust you. This package is perfect for those who need a website up and running, offering essential features to get you started.

Our tiers offer the flexibility to make more quality of life changes later.

  • Boot - Suitable for beginners.
  • Initiate - Suitable for displaying more content.
  • Engage - Suitable for expanding/adding features.

Pricing ​

We have 3 tiers of starter website packages for you to choose from. There are the general starting point of what each tier offers.

Tier/DetailsBootInitiateEngage
PriceS$2000S$3000S$4000
No. of Pages¹5810
WireframeSitemap Only+ Layouts+ Contents
Revisions123
ContentsNo (Dummy)ContextualStrategized
ImagesStock ImagesStock ImagesPremium Stock Images
FormsYes - BasicYes - With NotificationsYes - Custom
  • ¹Choose either `single scroll` website or `multipage` website. If single scroll, each section is limited to 850px in height, number of sections is equals to the number of pages indicated in the table.

Development Details

If the project does not foresee a drastic change in the future in terms of features and complexity, we will use Static Site Generators to fulfill this.

Our team will decide what platform is suitable based on the information we exchange so that it is still scalable.

Maintenance ​

Below is the maintenance plan that you can mix & match to fit your needs & budget.

Free Domain Name*1 year2 years3 years
SEOBasic IndexingOn-Page SEO20 keywords tracking
Business Emails135

MonthlyS$40S$100S$300

  • *Renews at S$25/year for regular TLD or S$65/year for country ccTLD. Contact for other TLDs.
  • ¹We will automatically use WordPress.
  • ²Simply annotate directly from the website to make change/edit requests.
  • ³General WhatsApp group. Not direct developer's WhatsApp.
  • ⁿUnused hours for the month will not be brought foward.

💡Add-Ons

You may also want to refer to add-ons to customize your maintenance plan further.
For example, you selected the cp0.5 plan but want to add just one business email rather than upgrading to the cp1.0 plan with features you may not need.
